article_title: Regressive Republican policies fail to improve our lives - Bucks County Courier Times: Guest Opinion
article_text:

og.description: I wonder how the Republican Party's agenda of tax cuts and other benefits for the rich help our base -- the middle class and blue collar workers.
og.title: Regressive Republican policies fail to improve our lives
